name: url-encoder-decoder
title: URL Encoder/Decoder
description: Allows encoding and decoding URLs, escaping or unescaping special characters to be a compliant/functioning URL

commands.name: url-encode
commands.title: URL Encode
commands.description: Converts special characters into escaped syntax
commands.subtitle: Encode a URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: seanmcilvenna
